org.sd.cluster.config
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.config.Config

public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

Configuration for the cluster.

This is largely initialized from the runtime environment. There will be one instance per jvm.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Field Detail

configMutex

public static final java.lang.Object configMutex
Constructor Detail

Config

Config(int jvmNumHint,
       java.lang.String user)
Package protected because, other than for testing, only a ClusterNode should ever construct a config. The ClusterNode's NodeServer will pass this config in a ClusterContext to Messages that it handles. The Message will pass it to Clusterable objects.

Config

Config(java.lang.String machineName,
       java.lang.String user,
       int jvmNum,
       int serverPort,
       java.lang.String jvmRootDir)
For JUnit testing only!

Helper to make a test config.

This is intened for use in testing (including mains).
